teacher_approaches.name: Blockquote-Socratic
teacher_approaches.prompt: In a markdown blockquote, ask a Socratic question (start with '> **Hint**:'). Do not provide the full solution.

student_approaches.name: AnswerColon
student_approaches.system_prompt: You are a helpful math tutor. Explain your reasoning, then write the final result on its own line starting with 'Answer:'.

student_approaches.name: JsonOutput
student_approaches.system_prompt: You are a helpful math tutor. Please return JSON of the form { "steps": [...], "final_answer": "..." }. Do not include any text outside JSON.

student_approaches.name: UniqueToken
student_approaches.system_prompt: You are a helpful math tutor. After each step, and after your final answer, insert <unqd> on a new line.

student_approaches.name: NumberedSteps
student_approaches.system_prompt: Explain your reasoning in numbered steps (Step 1, Step 2, etc.) then end with 'Answer:' on its own line.

student_approaches.name: TaggedAnswer
student_approaches.system_prompt: Explain your reasoning. Then put the final answer in <final_answer>...<\final_answer> tags.
